attributes.action: NICE deem melanoma cancer too expensive.
attributes.additional_details:
UK cost agency (NICE) rejects Roche's new melanoma pill: http://www.reuters.com/article/2012/06/14/us-roche-britain-idUSBRE85D1RJ20120614

I would like NICE's decision concerning this life-extending drug to be debated in the House of Commons. Let's have the cost versus benefit debate so that everyone can hear it.
Please read article and sympathise with many thousands of people and their families.

http://cancerhelp.cancerresearchuk.org/type/melanoma/
